name: Hot Space Potato Gun
description:
Space bugs want to get your potatoes!!

Don't let them! Your only ammo is heat and potato. Equip you defender ship with potato-guns and defend your crop! The space bugs will eat hot potatoes and die! THEY CANT HANDLE THE HEAT!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move
Space to shoot

Music:

"Survive - Chiptune Comp": https://opengameart.org/content/chiptune-music-for-arcade-games

Font:

Roboto by google: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto

Source code: https://github.com/janisskuja/hot-space-potato-gun

How it's made? - see VoD here: https://www.twitch.tv/jdzsk/
